name: pinata
title: Pinata
description: An extension to interact with the Pianta API and Submarine API
author: stevedsimkins

preferences.name: PINATA_JWT
preferences.description: Your Pinata API key JWT which can be created at https://app.pinata.cloud/developers
preferences.title: Pinata API JWT

preferences.name: SUBMARINE_KEY
preferences.description: Your Submarining API key which can be created at https://app.pinata.cloud/developers/v2-api-keys
preferences.title: Submarine API Key

preferences.name: GATEWAY
preferences.description: Paste in your Dedicated Gateway or public gateway in the following format: https://gateway.pinata.cloud
preferences.title: IPFS Gateway

commands.name: listFiles
commands.title: List Files
commands.description: Retrieve the latest 100 files from your Pinata account

commands.name: listSubmarineFiles
commands.title: List Submarined Files
commands.description: Retrieve the latest 100 Submarined files from your Pinata account
